records.summary: Red Pulsing Orb/Light over San Antonio, TX
records.story: Red Pulsing Orb/Light over San Antonio, TX On 12 Dec., 2017, at approximately 1850 hrs, my family and I witnessed a pulsing red light hovering over San Antonio.  It appeared to be floating over Kelly AFB, now Port San Antonio.  It gradually moved into position, then remained stationary for approx. 3 minutes.   No sound, and there were multiple a/c in the sky.  It did not appear that the other airborne craft were circling the object per se, it just looked as though they were in the traffic pattern for SA Int’l Airport.   The orb gradually disappeared by departing away from us to the east, as we were viewing from an elevated position to the west.  It remained perfectly still.  Not a helicopter, not a drone.  All witnesses (5) are ex-military two of which are private pilots.

records.summary: Ufo spotted, right before it vanished.
records.story: Ufo spotted, right before it vanished. San Antonio, Texas 11/03/17 approximate time 0710  The object flying that was seen appear to be hovering with a neon light of a shape a long oval craft from my angle about 400m when it noticed It had been spotted it it flew rapidly with another bright light tail and vanished in to thin air I and my passenger double looked the open clear sky and it was gone, so therefore, it couldn't had a been a airplane of any type with details of vanishing with in four seconds. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with the witness, and he confirmed that the sighting had occurred in the morning.  PD))

records.summary: Two objects flying together, with strange lights
records.story: Two objects flying together, with strange lights We were at the Halloween horror theme park, Scream-a-geddon, waiting in line for the hayride.  I looked up into the trees, and saw two “airplanes” flying close to each other, side by side.  It was an odd way to be flying so close, so I took notice. I told my husband to look how close they were, and as he watched, they moved from. Ext to each other to over top of each other.  They were silent, and not helicopters. As me and my husband watched, trying to figure them out, we noticed the lighting was way different than airplanes.  It wasn’t blinking, it was flashing consstantky, with colors.  Like red, yellow, white, red, yellow, white... in a cir Jose formation, not a blinking red light, like a plane.  They slowed down once they moved in the vertical formation, and disappeared behind the trees.  I can’t stop thinking about them, they were silent, ave

records.summary: 20-25 metallic triangular objects spotted on Cinco de Mayo in San Antonio.
records.story: 20-25 metallic triangular objects spotted on Cinco de Mayo in San Antonio. We were at Bandera & Loop 1604 sitting in traffic and we saw about 20-25 metallic triangular objects that I don’t believe were balloons or birds, but formed a circular shape and flew together in a formation.   At that point I grabbed my cell camera and caught a video of it. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with the witness, and have requested a copy of the video.  We have not received the video, as of the date of the posting of this written report.  PD))

records.summary: Orange sphere travels from E to W/
records.story: Orange Sphere Travels From East to West Bright orange sphere traveled from east to west approximately 300 ft off the ground.  Object floated silently overhead at a constant rate of speed, maybe accelerating slightly.  Considered it may be a drone, but it was extremely silent.   Consulted a friend that is a drone enthusiast and they stated that "orange" is not a common color for drone illumination.  They contacted other drone enthusiasts to see if any of them knew of/had an orange illuminated drone. No one had orange lights or knew of anyone with orange lights on their drones.   I had seen the exact same object a year ago hovering over 410 and NW Military Hwy about 150-200 ft off the ground.  There were 2 of them at that time, and both orange, but exactly the same as this recent sighting.

records.summary: Spacecraft seen by two people over power lines, poles, and electrical cables.
records.story: spacecraft seen by two people over power lines, poles, and electrical cables On Wednesday, February 14, my husband and I returned to our San 	Antonio, Texas apartment complex at around 7:45 PM.  As we got out of 	the car we heard a loud rumbling, with a kind of chugging undertone, and it 	sounded unfamiliar.  When we got off the elevator and walked to our 	apartment we saw what appeared to be oval-shaped planes flying much too 	low… somewhat shocked, we walked inside our apartment, went to the large 	living room windows, and saw two spacecraft directly across the street, 	in the sky. 		They were a silver metallic color, larger than helicopters, and they 	“parked” directly above poles for electricity and cables.  There were two 	spacecraft, and one of them faced the other, a bit lower, and at an angle. 	I had a better view of the one on the right, and there two lit windows on the 	side – gold light.  Both of them were square, and one window was smaller 	than the other. 		No wings attached to the spacecraft. 		They were stationary over the power lines and the poles for 	approximately 20- 25 minutes.  I would come back to check if they were 	still there from time to time. When I was away from the window we heard 	the loud rumbling noise again. I went to the window – they were gone. 		I did hear the same rumbling two more times during the next 48 	hours, but no sighting. 		I should mention that previously on Monday, Feb. 12, I saw an owl in 	a tree through the same living room window. The tree it stood in is only about 	15 feet from these poles and power lines for electrical cables, etc!  And very 	unusual to see an owl here, and this close on a city street. 		The owl was asleep, woke up, and looked directly at me 		before it flew away.

records.summary: Strange Light Over San Antonio (Fresno St/Edison HS Area)
records.story: Strange Light Over San Antonio (Fresno St/Edison HS Area) I was picking up my friend from her house around 10 o’clock.  She was trying to sneak out of her house, so my other friend and I waited in the car for her.  We didn’t want people to notice us so we turned off the headlights completely and lowered the inside lights coming from the console down (thus there was no chance it was a glare).   We were waiting and then in an instant, both of us see this yellow-greenish light.  It was rectangular.  The street itself was completely dark with the exception of a light post off in the distance.  It just appeared out of nowhere.  It glided downwards for 5 seconds and then it just ended.  It didn’t touch the ground, all of this happened mid-air.  It was so quick but very vivid.  We could tell it was a rectangle with a green-yellow light/aura coming from it.   It was that high but it wasn’t that low.  I would say it was at the height of when airplanes just take off, like when they haven’t reached their height cruising speed but not that low.  It was very odd.   The windows were down to and we didn’t hear anything coming from it.  It couldn’t have been a firework or flare as it didn’t come up, it just appeared and then went down.  It couldn’t have been a drone, we would have seen the lights continue and it wouldn’t have just appeared out of nowhere.  And it definitely wasn’t an airplane or a helicopter.

records.summary: Bright lights 60 feet above ground near abandoned improved assisted living facility
records.story: Bright lights 60 feet above ground near abandoned improved assisted living facility Hi –  Ok – I personally know the person who posted the 2/21/18 report from San Antonio.  I admit that when the original poster shared her sightings with me, my analytical mind started looking for ways to “explain” away her reports.  However, I do trust the original poster. Several months after the 2/21/18 poster shared her sightings with me, I woke up at about 2 a.m.  I live directly below the original poster.  While laying on the couch, I could see out my blinds across the abandoned yet improved adjacent property.  I could see through the blinds three very bright lights . . . in close formation.  The lights appeared to change in colors and I do recall a red light and a very bright cold blue light.  I know I saw what I saw – I even got up off my couch and walked out onto my balcony.  The lights/device/thing was probably 100 yards away – to the North – and appeared to be about treetop height – approximately 60 feet in the air.  I kept staring at whatever it was.  With a few exceptions, it remained stationary.  My initial thought was “drone.”  My second thought was “drone flown by some pervert trying to look into our apartment windows.”  But it was all too weird. Look – I have a graduate degree.  I’m 48 years old.  I love science.  I consider myself pretty sharp and definitely not hysterical.  I dig on the scientific method and I get that the simplest explanation is often the correct one.  But . . . based on operational logistics and the location of the observation, something was strange and inexplicable.  I saw what I saw – it got my chalupa eating hiney off the couch and onto the patio for a better view.  It was too large to be a drone.  Plus – why at 2 a.m.  . . . over a very abandoned but secure retirement community???  If someone were flying a drone, they would “fly it” . . . as in it should move . . . instead it hovered for like 15 minutes til it simply disappeared with no change in elevation. Very strange. I would be interested to know whether my location was the same as an earlier poster above from April 2019 who reported seeing an object while with her fiancée.  I wonder if that occurred in the same area/location. I saw what I saw.  I was intrigued enough to go outside for a better look.  My upstairs neighbor has seen similar objects.  Weird.

records.summary: I saw fiery orange lights no sound flying at low altitude no noise they moved south then flanked back but they all flanked at the same
records.story: I saw fiery orange lights no sound flying at low altitude no noise they moved south then flanked back but they all flanked at the same area  as they flew higher I took pictures and video  I tried to close up to see if they were lanterns but there was no flickering I have seen them before, but can’t identify them.

records.summary: Was driving home heading south on Commercial avenue on the south side of San Antonio. We noticed a large flash of light in the south ea
records.story: Was driving home, heading south on Commercial Avenue, on the south side of San Antonio.  We noticed a large flash of light in the south eastern part of the sky.  Each flash was blue in color.  Flashes lasted only a few seconds, but continued for several minutes around the San Antonio River and Loop 410 area.  There was no accompanying sound, smoke or any reports of electrical power being lost.  The flashes light up the entire portion of the sky.  There was a gas main that caught fire, but it was reported at 0100 hrs a full 5 hours after these flashes were observed.

records.summary: Aliens walking into the Bank , conducting bank transaction, and walking out.
records.story: Aliens walking into the Bank , conducting bank transaction, and walking out. I am an experienced retail banker with over 12 years of experience in Mortgage Lending/Branch banking. I have my bachelors degree in business management, and I have clear vision and of sound mind.  My co-workers who are also close friends of mine are witnesses as well. There are about 5 of us who have this conversation annually so I wanted to report this information.  Once a month in 2014, a family- who we are convinced are aliens disguised as humans -would enter our bank branch and cash small checks. Prior to my encounter, When my co-workers would tell me about a family that would come into our branch and looked like aliens, I would laugh it off.  However, I encountered them twice and I changed my mind.  When we tell people our story, it sounds crazy to outsiders.  The family would captivate your attention the second they would walk into the bank. There were 5 people in the "family".... a "dad", "mom", and "three daughters". All three daughters appeared to be teenagers and the same exact height. Both parents were the same exact height. They were ash/grayish in color, and their heads were shaped like inverted triangles and their heads formed cone-ish towards the back. This was more prominent on the dad as he was completely bald. The women had short, blond-ish hair. Their garments were always drab. The Parents were an estimated 5 foot 3 inches. the kids, 5 foot 1 inch.  What was interesting about them was they would walk into the bank in a single file line. Their legs would walk together military-like and in unison, and their energy captured all of the attention of everyone in the bank, including our bank customers. People had a hard time keeping their eyes off of them.  The dad came directly to my teller line and was a foot in front of me. His eyes matched the rest of the family- dark, large pupils, and I felt like he was staring into my mind. I can't explain it. The family stood directly behind him and stared at me the entire transaction as well, without saying a word. The father had a muffled English voice. Once the transaction was over, the family turned and walk in a single file line out of the branch.  This happened an additional time that I can recall, but the dad did not come to my teller line. However, the family had everyones attention throughout the entire transaction once again.  This happened a few times, and all of my friends can recall up to 4 separate times they entered the branch.  None of us can remember their names, their accounts, or anything. We never thought to take a picture. The only reason I can give as to why we didn't document it, was because of the attention they grabbed from us, and how shocked we were after each encounter. It was strange and indescribable.  They all wore red garments.
